name: GamejoltAPI
description: Be careful: most of the actions are Asynchronous !
The request result is stored in a Scene variable of your choice that you can use later.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Support the complete Gamejolt API (trophies, leaderboards, storage and users).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: GamejoltAPI

eventsFunctions.description: The connected user has active session.
eventsFunctions.name: ActiveSession
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ user has an active session

eventsFunctions.description: After a request, check if it was a success.
eventsFunctions.name: Success
eventsFunctions.sentence: Last _PARAM0_ request is successful

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a request is waiting an answer.
eventsFunctions.name: Ready
eventsFunctions.sentence: Request of _PARAM0_ is ready

eventsFunctions.description: Player is authenticated on Gamejolt.
eventsFunctions.name: Authenticated
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_  player is authenticated on Gamejolt

eventsFunctions.description: The response message of the object. Only available after an error.
eventsFunctions.name: Message
eventsFunctions.sentence: The response message

eventsFunctions.description: Set a direct authentication for the Gamejolt user. Use it to keep the user connected after changing the scene.
eventsFunctions.name: UserForceAuth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set _PARAM2_ / _PARAM3_ as current user for _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch complete user data from Gamejolt.
eventsFunctions.name: UserFetch
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ will request _PARAM2_ user data using identifier: _PARAM3_ (Scene storage: _PARAM4_)

parameters.longDescription:
You can use comma-separated list to find multiple users
Example 1: gdevelop,player123,snailmaster
Example 2: 321123,505050,778899
parameters.name: Username

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Authenticate Gamejolt user before using the account functionalities.
eventsFunctions.name: UserAuthentication
eventsFunctions.sentence: Authenticate _PARAM2_ / _PARAM3_ for _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the connected user friend list.
eventsFunctions.name: UserListFriends
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch friends from connected user of _PARAM0_  (Scene storage: _PARAM2_)

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Retrieve the server time.
eventsFunctions.name: GameTime
eventsFunctions.sentence: Get the server time of _PARAM0_ (Scene storage: _PARAM2_)

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Open a game session for the connected user (lasts 120s, update the status to reset the timer).
eventsFunctions.name: GameSessionOpen
eventsFunctions.sentence: Open a session for _PARAM0_ connected user

eventsFunctions.description: Close a game session for the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: GameSessionClose
eventsFunctions.sentence: Close a session for _PARAM0_ connected user

eventsFunctions.description: Verify if the session still exists.
eventsFunctions.name: GameSessionUpdate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Verify if the _PARAM0_ user game session is still running

eventsFunctions.description: Change the game session status on the server.
eventsFunctions.name: GameSessionStatus
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the _PARAM0_ user session status to _PARAM2_ and reset the timer

parameters.longDescription:
Status role : 
- keep : keep the same status as before
- active : set that the player is playing the game
- idle : set that the player is waiting

Warning : "keep" will only be sent every 30s to the server. The others are always sent. Be careful.
parameters.name: Status

eventsFunctions.description: Add score in the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreAdd
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send _PARAM0_ user or guest _PARAM3_ (force guest: _PARAM2_) score _PARAM4_ _PARAM5_ with extra _PARAM6_ on board _PARAM7_

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.description: (optional) Extra data you want to save with the score record
parameters.name: Extra

eventsFunctions.description: Add a labelled score in the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreAddWithLabel
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send _PARAM0_ user or guest _PARAM3_ (force guest: _PARAM2_) score _PARAM4_ with label _PARAM5_ with extra _PARAM6_ on board _PARAM7_

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.description: (optional) Extra data you want to save with the score record
parameters.name: Extra

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch user's scores on the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreFetchFromUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ user or guest _PARAM2_ (force guest: _PARAM3_ ) _PARAM4_ best scores from the board _PARAM5_ filtered _PARAM6_ _PARAM7_ (Scene storage : _PARAM8_ )

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.description: Score to use for the filter
parameters.longDescription: If a filter is selected, give the score basis to use
parameters.name: FilterScore

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the best scores on the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreFetch
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch from _PARAM0_ the _PARAM2_ best scores from the board _PARAM3_ filtered _PARAM4_ _PARAM5_ (Scene storage: _PARAM6_ )

parameters.description: Score to use for the filter
parameters.longDescription: If a filter is selected, give the score basis to use (example: better than 30)
parameters.name: FilterScore

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the score rank in the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreRank
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ rank of _PARAM2_ score in the board _PARAM3_ (Scene storage: _PARAM4_)

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch all the leaderboard informations (without scores).
eventsFunctions.name: ScoreTables
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ leaderboards informations (Scene storage: _PARAM2_)

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch trophies informations of the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: TrophyFetch
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ user trophies with filter: _PARAM2_ (Scene storage: _PARAM3_)

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch trophies of the authenticated user.
eventsFunctions.name: TrophyFetchByIdentifier
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ trophy identified by _PARAM2_ (Scene storage: _PARAM3_ )

parameters.longDescription:
You can use a comma-separated list to fetch multiple trophies
Example: 123123,505050,98700
parameters.name: Trophy

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Set that a trophy has been obtained by the player.
eventsFunctions.name: TrophyAdd
eventsFunctions.sentence: Unlock _PARAM0_ trophy _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Remove a trophy from the player achievements.
eventsFunctions.name: TrophyRemove
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove the _PARAM0_ trophy _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch cloud game data.
eventsFunctions.name: DataFetch
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ data with key _PARAM3_ in the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage (Scene storage: _PARAM4_)

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Save game data in the cloud storage.
eventsFunctions.name: DataSet
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ stores _PARAM4_ with _PARAM3_ key in the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

eventsFunctions.description: Remove game data from the cloud storage.
eventsFunctions.name: DataRemove
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ removes data with _PARAM3_ key from the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

eventsFunctions.description: Update a numerical cloud value.
eventsFunctions.name: DataOperator
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ changes the value of _PARAM3_ key from the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage: _PARAM4_ _PARAM5_

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.description: Operation to do on the data
parameters.name: Operator

eventsFunctions.description: Update a cloud text.
eventsFunctions.name: DataOperatorText
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ changes the text of _PARAM3_ key from the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage: _PARAM4_ _PARAM5_

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.description: Operation to do on the data
parameters.name: Operator

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the data keys.
eventsFunctions.name: DataKeys
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fetch _PARAM0_ keys in the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage filtered with _PARAM3_ (Scene storage: _PARAM4_)

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.longDescription:
How to use patterns : 
- write the part of the key you know, for example "room"
- then put a * where the key can change

Example "room*" will retrieve "room_123" "room_456" "roomABC" etc.
parameters.name: Pattern

parameters.description: Scene variable for storing the result
parameters.name: Storage

eventsFunctions.description: Call Gamejolt API with the prepared URL.
eventsFunctions.name: GamejoltCall
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send _PARAM0_ prepared URL and save it (_PARAM3_) in scene variable _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set if the last request came back without any error.
eventsFunctions.name: SetSuccess
eventsFunctions.sentence: Success of the last _PARAM0_ request: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set if the request is ready or not.
eventsFunctions.name: SetReady
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ request is ready: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Current URL.
eventsFunctions.name: CurrentURL

eventsFunctions.description: Secret game key.
eventsFunctions.name: Key

eventsFunctions.description: Convert text to SHA1.
eventsFunctions.name: SHA1

inlineCode: var A, B, C, D, E;
for( i=0; i<16; i++ ) W[i] = word_array[blockstart+i];
var temp = cvt_hex(H0) + cvt_hex(H1) + cvt_hex(H2) + cvt_hex(H3) + cvt_hex(H4);

propertyDescriptors.label: The GameJolt game identifier
